Articles.Content: Hey im new to KSP and im not that good so it would be nice if some people could offer me some tips!

Welcome to the forums!

Anything in particular you need tips for?

Thanks

In the game i want to know when you get to the moons does a lunar thing automaticly come out or do u have to make one.

And on the forums how do you put a banner for signiture

For the banner, simply use BBCode: Type (img)www.example.image.com(/img) But, replace the (\'s and )\'s with [\'s and ]\'s.

What\'d you mean by \'lunar thing\', though?
Thanks and i mean like the thing he uses to land on the moon here

Ah, no, you\'ll have to build a Munar Lander yourself: Typically, you\'ll want Parachute, Capsule, Decoupler, Fuel, Engine and lander legs. For them;

With demo, use winglets as lander legs, with paid version, there are deployable lander legs. (Use G)
ive got payed the game was so good on demo that i couldnt resist buying it
